sections.title: With header
sections.content: Display file previews or other content above the input area using the header slot.

sections.title: Inline
sections.content: Place action buttons alongside the input in a single row for a more compact layout.
examples: <flux:composer wire:model="prompt" rows="1" inline label="Prompt" label:sr-only placeholder="How can I help you today?"> <x-slot name="actionsLeading"> <flux:button size="sm" variant="ghost" icon="plus" /> </x-slot> <x-slot name="actionsTrailing"> <flux:button size="sm" variant="filled" icon="microphone" /> <flux:button type="submit" size="sm" variant="primary" icon="paper-airplane" /> </x-slot></flux:composer>

sections.title: Input variant
sections.content: Use the variant="input" prop to render the composer with border radiuses that match other form inputs.
examples: <flux:composer variant="input" label="Message" placeholder="What's on your mind?"> <!-- ... --></flux:composer>

sections.title: Height
sections.content: Set the initial and maximum height of the input area using rows and max-rows.

sections.title: Submit behavior
sections.content: By default, the form submits when pressing Ctrl/Cmd + Enter. Set submit="enter" to submit on Enter alone.

sections.title: Rich text
sections.content: Enable rich text formatting by passing an editor component to the input slot.
examples: <flux:composer wire:model="prompt" rows="3" label="Prompt" label:sr-only placeholder="How can I help you today?"> <x-slot name="input"> <flux:editor variant="borderless" toolbar="bold italic bullet ordered | link | align" /> </x-slot> <x-slot name="actionsLeading"> <flux:button size="sm" variant="subtle" icon="paper-clip" /> <flux:button size="sm" variant="subtle" icon="slash" /> <flux:button size="sm" variant="subtle" icon="adjustments-horizontal" /> </x-slot> <x-slot name="actionsTrailing"> <flux:button size="sm" variant="filled" icon="microphone" /> <flux:button type="submit" size="sm" variant="primary" icon="paper-airplane" /> </x-slot></flux:composer>

sections.title: Disabled
sections.content: Prevent user interaction with the composer by adding the disabled attribute.

sections.title: Invalid
sections.content: When paired with a name or wire:model attribute alongside a label prop, validation errors will automatically apply invalid styling to the composer.
